overview: In a remote village, a city-returning young man finds himself embroiled in situations that turn mountains into molehills out of village politics. A tale that winds through the intricacies of family inheritance and the test of love against wealth. A goofy pair’s antics take a dark turn while the love of someone’s life go up in a mushroom cloud. Family values wrapped in irony, it’s a story crafted from the slices of each and every one of our lives.
title: Once Upon a Time
